text.tspan: L is the length of the link,
d is a minimum distance from a hinge H to the end of the link
x is an offset distance from the hinge H to the link center C
n (not shown) is a normalized distance
therefore when n is in the range 0 ... 1
y is a distance from the hinge H to the pivot point P
m (not shown) is another normalized distance
therefore when m is in the range 0 ... 1
